scripts.build:doc-site: yarn build:theme && yarn workspace doc-site build
scripts.build:html5: yarn build:theme && yarn workspace html5 build
scripts.build:html5-offline: yarn build:theme && yarn workspace html5 build-offline
scripts.dev:doc-site: NODE_ENV=development concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn dev:theme" "yarn workspace doc-site dev"
scripts.dev:html5: NODE_ENV=development concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn dev:theme" "yarn workspace html5 dev"
scripts.dev:html5-offline: NODE_ENV=development concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn dev:theme" "yarn workspace html5 dev-offline"
scripts.dev:plugin: NODE_ENV=development yarn build:plugin && yarn workspace @doctools/gw-plugin-redoc dev
scripts.dev:test-site: NODE_ENV=development concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn dev:theme" "yarn workspace test-site dev"
scripts.dev:theme: NODE_ENV=development yarn build:theme && yarn workspace @doctools/gw-theme-classic dev
scripts.profile:html5: yarn build:theme && yarn workspace html5 profile
